text: The 2016 American Athletic Conference men's soccer season was the 4th season of men's varsity soccer in the conference. The SMU Mustangs are the defending regular season champions, and the Tulsa Golden Hurricane are the defending tournament champions. == Changes from 2015 == * None == Teams == === Stadia and locations === {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: left;" ! Team ! Location ! Stadium !
